definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time

sentences.english: I think next time I want to see a comedy.
sentences.chinese: 我想下次我要看一部搞笑片。

sentences.english: So the next time I need it, I can look it up.
sentences.chinese: 所以下次我需要的時候，我就可以進行查詢。

sentences.english: I remember hours of acne fast right next coated, printed pox will not leave.
sentences.chinese: 下次記得痘痘快好的時分塗，就不會留下痘印了。

sentences.english: The next date in the case at New York Supreme Court before Judge Michael Obus was set for July 18.
sentences.chinese: 紐約最高法庭就此案的下次開庭日期是7月18日。

sentences.english: In cesarean section, the peritoneum should be sutured to provide a favorable condition for next operation.
sentences.chinese: 行剖宮產術時應縫合腹膜，爲下次手術創造有利條件。

sentences.english: Next time I see Rick, I’m going to let him have it.
sentences.chinese: 下次我看到李克時要他好看。

sentences.english: I do have 3 bikes with handle bar brakes that she can use.
sentences.chinese: 我有三輛車子是帶手閘的，下次她可以用這種車子。

sentences.english: I know my own strength, and I shall never be embarrassed again by his coming.
sentences.chinese: 這次我既然能夠應付，等他下次再來，我便不會發窘。

sentences.english: Hope I can do a better background next time.
sentences.chinese: 希望下次能造個更佳的地臺。

sentences.english: Next time somebody asks for a radio interview, I’ll do better.
sentences.chinese: 下次有人邀我做電臺訪問的時候，我會做得更好些。

sentences.english: I swore that I would take part in the voting with all my soul.
sentences.chinese: 我暗自對天發誓，下次投票我一定全心投入。

sentences.english: Next time she goes out, she’ll know better.
sentences.chinese: 下次她出門，就會知道咋辦了。

sentences.english: The next class the professor handed the tests back out.
sentences.chinese: 下次上課時，教授將考卷發下去。

sentences.english: What we've got to turn to next time, then, is the question, what else might it be? Okay.
sentences.chinese: 下次我們要探討的問題是，還會是什麼？，下課。

sentences.english: Please remember to bring markers and glue next time.
sentences.chinese: 下次請記得帶彩色筆和膠水。

sentences.english: Next time won't you sing with me?
sentences.chinese: 下次你會和我一起唱嗎？

definition: Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
when the moment comes/at that time
another day/some other time/to find another day (for appointment etc)/to take a rain check
(modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]
oh (interjection indicating that one has just learned sth)
sentence-final particle that conveys informality, warmth, friendliness or intimacy/may also indicate that one is stating a fact that the other person is not aware of
